cs:php: phpcs src/ tests/ config/ autoload.php rector.php -q --standard=Generic --sniffs=Generic.PHP.Syntax --colors
cs:lint: phpcs src/ tests/ config/ autoload.php rector.php -p --runtime-set ignore_warnings_on_exit 1
cs:fix: phpcbf src/ tests/ config/ autoload.php rector.php -p || phpcbf src/ tests/ config/ autoload.php rector.php -q

scripts-descriptions.refactor:lint: Runs Rector on the code to check available refactors.
scripts-descriptions.refactor:write: Refactor de code using Rector as helper.
scripts-descriptions.check:all: Runs coding standard analysis (PHP: Code Sniffer) + tests (PHPUnit).
scripts-descriptions.cs:php: Runs PHP syntax checks (PHP: Code Sniffer) and PHPStan analysis.
scripts-descriptions.cs:lint: Runs coding standards linting (PHP: Code Sniffer).
scripts-descriptions.cs:fix: Runs coding standards auto-fixes (PHP: Code Sniffer).
scripts-descriptions.test:wip: Runs Work In Progress tests with PHPUnit (marked with `@group wip`).
scripts-descriptions.test:coverage: Runs PHPUnit tests and builds the code coverage report (as XML clover format) in `output/code-coverage/clover.xml`.
scripts-descriptions.test:coverage-html: Runs PHPUnit tests and builds the code coverage report (as HTML) in `output/code-coverage/` directory.
scripts-descriptions.build:api-docs: Builds API documentation in VuePress sources format to `docs/api/` directory using phpDocumentor.
